extension.description: Estuary-sosac je výchozí vzhled pro Kodi 19.0 a vyšší. Snaží se být jednoduše pochopitelný a použitelný pro nové uživatele Kodi.
Estuary-sosac is the default skin for Kodi 19.0 and above. It attempts to be easy for first time Kodi users to understand and use.
Estuary-sosac is the default skin for Kodi 19.0 and above. It attempts to be easy for first time Kodi users to understand and use.
